searchLabels.result: Nothing found | {count} result has found | {count} results has found

categoryLabels.label: Category
categoryLabels.empty_details: Try to set {all_regions} in your location, or expand your search area on the map and save it again

barterLabels.select: Select item that you want exchange
barterLabels.outdated: This offer publication date has expired

categorySelectionLabels.label: Category Selection
categorySelectionLabels.description: Specify the field for category selection in offers:
categorySelectionLabels.help_info:
The "Category" option is a selection of offers posted in the current category.

The "Exchange List" option is a selection of offers which propose you an exchange for the current category.

Example:
- to find out which goods and services can be purchased for PKOIN, you need to go to the "Pocketcoins" category and select the "Exchange List" option.

appBannerLabels.title: Stay in touch!
appBannerLabels.paragraph1: To avoid missing messages in the messenger from interested users, use a mobile application with push notifications enabled.
appBannerLabels.paragraph2: You need to download the mobile application and log in. Links to download the application for major operating systems are located on the applications page.
appBannerLabels.details: If the Applications page does not open for some reason, please manually copy the link below and open it using your browser.

exchangeLabels.label: Exchange Options
exchangeLabels.title: We can find exchange options for you
exchangeLabels.text: Offer an exchange if you like the option found. Below are the best options.
exchangeLabels.empty: We can't find any exchange options right now :(

locationLabels.address_not_found: Sorry, that address could not be found

dialogLabels.label: Dialog
dialogLabels.data_node: Posting data to node, please wait..
dialogLabels.offer_renew: Are you sure you want renew this offer?
dialogLabels.offer_withdraw: Are you sure you want withdraw this offer?
dialogLabels.offer_delete: Are you sure you want remove this offer?
dialogLabels.pending_reg: Please wait until your account being activacted
dialogLabels.contact_seller: Do you want to contact the seller?
dialogLabels.contact_sellers: Do you want to contact the sellers?
dialogLabels.opening_room: The chat is opening. Please wait.
dialogLabels.submit_rating: Do you want to submit the rating?
dialogLabels.submit_comment: Do you want to submit the comment?
dialogLabels.map_help_info:
Offers displayed in the lists (category content, exchange offers, etc.) can be filtered by the visible area of the map.

Set it so that it covers the desired search area and click the "Save" button. To reset the selection, click the "All regions" button.
dialogLabels.saving_region_warning_by_zoom: The coverage of the visible map area is too small. Offer lists will be filtered by this area. Continue anyway?
dialogLabels.disabled_permissions: The following permissions are disabled: {error}. Click the "Application Settings" button to allow the access.
dialogLabels.app_geolocation_permission_error: You have restricted access to geolocation. Click the "Application Settings" button to allow the access.
dialogLabels.platform_geolocation_permission_error: Access to geolocation is restricted in the browser or operating system settings. You need to allow the access.
dialogLabels.error#4: You have already rated this offer earlier
dialogLabels.error#5: You can't add a rating to your own offer

photosLabels.upload_image_text: The first photo will be displayed in the offer, select the best one. You can upload up to {count} photos in {formats} format.

feedbackLabels.title: Leave your feedback here
feedbackLabels.name: Type your name here
feedbackLabels.submit_success: Your request has been successfully submitted

title: Title
my_list_text: Use this option when you need to specify the same exchange list for offers. The list can also be edited in your profile
choose_currency_text: The price in currency will be updating automatically at the current PKOIN rate
